sections.title: Extraordinary Abilities (Ex)
sections.description: Rules for non-magical extraordinary abilities that cannot be learned without extensive training

sections.title: Spell-Like Abilities (Sp)
sections.description: Rules for magical abilities that function like spells, including spell resistance and dispelling

sections.title: Supernatural Abilities (Su)
sections.description: Rules for magical abilities that are not spell-like, including comparison table of ability types

sections.title: Blindsight
sections.description: Extraordinary ability to operate effectively without vision using non-visual senses

sections.title: Blindsense
sections.description: Ability to notice things without seeing them, but without the precision of blindsight

sections.title: Channel Resistance
sections.description: Bonus on Will saves against channeled energy effects

sections.title: Charm and Compulsion
sections.description: Mental effects that cloud minds, including charming and compelling creatures

sections.title: Damage Reduction
sections.description: Supernatural ability to ignore or reduce physical damage from attacks

sections.title: Darkvision
sections.description: Extraordinary ability to see in complete darkness in black and white

sections.title: Death Attacks
sections.description: Attacks that kill instantly, usually allowing a Fortitude save to avoid the effect

sections.title: Energy Drain and Negative Levels
sections.description: Life-draining attacks that impose negative levels and associated penalties

sections.title: Energy Immunity and Vulnerability
sections.description: Complete immunity to energy types or taking extra damage from them

sections.title: Energy Resistance
sections.description: Ability to ignore some damage from specific energy types per attack

sections.title: Ethereal
sections.description: Being invisible, insubstantial, and able to move through solid objects

sections.title: Fear (Su or Sp)
sections.description: Effects that cause shaken, frightened, or panicked conditions, including fear auras and attacks

sections.title: Invisibility
sections.description: Being undetectable by vision, including detection methods and combat interactions

sections.title: Low-Light Vision
sections.description: Enhanced eyesight that allows seeing twice as far in dim light conditions

sections.title: Paralysis
sections.description: Magical immobilization that prevents movement and most physical actions

sections.title: Scent
sections.description: Extraordinary ability to detect and track creatures by sense of smell

sections.title: Spell Resistance
sections.description: Extraordinary ability to avoid being affected by spells and spell-like abilities
